name: JavaForce
short_description: JavaForce (JF) is a Java library extending the capabilities of Java. It includes a VoIP stack and JNA bindings for FFMPEG, OpenGL, and Camera (Windows, Linux and Mac). Includes: ActiveX controls for IE and Windows Desktop Sharing placed in a Canvas.  Includes an OpenGL framework that can load .3ds and .blend files. Includes many apps such as jPhoneLite, jPBXLite, jfPaint, jfVideo Creator, etc.  This system is also the core of the Java/Linux Operating System : jfLinux.sf.net
